title: Cohen raid sought details on payments to women: source
text:
Cohen raid sought details on payments to women: source Tuesday, April 10, 2018 - 01:58 
FBI agents who raided the offices of President Trump's personal attorney were looking for details about ''arrangements, agreements and payments'' related to two women who have said they had sexual relationships with Trump.   
FBI agents who raided the offices of President Trump's personal attorney were looking for details about "arrangements, agreements and payments" related to two women who have said they had sexual relationships with Trump.  //reut.rs/2HsePXG
